response.overview: A group of mercenaries are hired by a past survivor of a brutal attack, to track down and stop a mysterious killer. Armed to the teeth & ready to kill, the mercenaries make their way to an abandoned farm property. It is soon discovered that all is not what it seems, when they are attacked by a crazy mutant cannibal hillbilly... The notorious X-Ray! Trapped on the farm with no possible escape, the night becomes a battle for survival as secrets unravel and bodies pile up! The Final Hunt Begins, in this 80's throwback Slasher style Grindhouse movie!
response.tagline: Welcome To The Last Stop, Where It's Hunt Or Be Hunted!
response.title: Blood Farm
